summary: HIT A DEER... AFTER ACCIDENT, ABS LIGHT WOULD NOT GO OUT. I PRESUMED IT WAS ACCIDENT RELATED. WHEN BODY SHOP INVESTIGATED THEY FOUND WIRES FROM ABS UNIT HAD CORRODED AND FALLEN OFF. DEALER CONTACT SAID THEY HAVE HAD SEVERAL IN THE PAST TWO MONTHS BUT NO RECALL NOTICE HAS BEEN ISSUED YET.   *NLM
